## Tutorial


::: {.cell hash='GNAR_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-3_b2761b67895a9e232ac4ef806df333f3'}
::: {.cell-output-display}
![](GNAR_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-3-1.png){width=672}
:::
:::

::: {.cell hash='GNAR_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-4_766d4becbe26bc89d748af70ebb5c02a'}

```{.r .cell-code}
# make_graph(~1-2-3-1, 1-4-5) # make igraph
# fiveVTS
five_gnar <- GNARfit(vts = fiveVTS, net = fiveNet, alphaOrder = 2)
# alphaOrder gives time lag
```
:::

::: {.cell hash='GNAR_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-5_9b0f7df58ee013ecedb4523466ed046b'}

```{.r .cell-code}
plot(fiveVTS[,1], ylab = "Node A time series")
lines(fitted(five_gnar)[,1], col = 2)
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](GNAR_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-5-1.png){width=672}
:::
:::


The residuals are examined as follows



::: {.cell hash='GNAR_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-6_081b6880e88012405b4651e29ad6f2da'}

```{.r .cell-code}
layout(matrix(c(1,2), 2, 1))
par(mar = c(4.1, 4.1, 1, 2.1), cex.axis = 0.9)
plot(ts(residuals(five_gnar)[,1]), ylab = "model residuals")
hist(residuals(five_gnar)[,1], main = "", xlab = "model residuals")
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](GNAR_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-6-1.png){width=672}
:::
:::



Show that GNAR does not have a problem with missing data,


::: {.cell hash='GNAR_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-7_e06721eca96628206924dd8a36b930d3'}

```{.r .cell-code}
fiveVTS0 <- fiveVTS

fiveVTS0[50:150, 3] <- NA
nafit <- GNARfit(vts = fiveVTS0, net = fiveNet, alphaOrder = 2, betaOrder = c(1, 1))
layout(matrix(c(1, 2), 2, 1))
par(mar = c(4.1, 4.1, 0.75, 2.1), cex.axis = 0.75)
plot(ts(fitted(nafit)[, 3]), ylab = "Node C fitted values")
par(mar = c(4.1, 4.1, 0.75, 2.1), cex.axis = 0.75)
plot(ts(fitted(nafit)[, 4]), ylab = "Node D fitted values")
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](GNAR_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-7-1.png){width=672}
:::
:::

::: {.cell hash='GNAR_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-8_bf7870a494277015aa4e22bcd7d68809'}

```{.r .cell-code}
as_latex("L = ") + as_latex("hello")
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
$$L = hello$$
:::
:::
